title: Yamada-kun to 7-nin no Majo (TV) (Yamada-kun and the Seven Witches)
synopsis: When Ryuu Yamada entered high school, he wanted to turn over a new leaf and lead a productive school life. That's why he chose to attend Suzaku High, where no one would know of his violent delinquent reputation. However, much to Ryuu's dismay, he is soon bored; now a second year, Ryuu has reverted to his old waysâ€”lazy with abysmal grades and always getting into fights.
